unnormalised: Dr. Aisha Khan, a renowned cardiologist at AIIMS, New Delhi, was awarded the Padma Bhushan this year. The news sent ripples of joy and pride throughout the medical community in India. Dr. Khan, whose dedication to her patients is legendary, has been serving at AIIMS for over 25 years. She has pioneered several innovative surgical techniques and has been instrumental in setting up cardiac care units across the country.
